wikipedia_page.main: Sir Edward Beauchamp, 1st Baronet JP (12 April 1849 – 1 February 1925) was a British businessman and Liberal Party politician.

response: * Sir Edward Beauchamp, Liberal Party Member of Parliament for Lowestoft from 1906 to 1922

Lady Evelyn was launched as a debutante and presented at court in 1920,The Tatler, Wednesday 14 April 1920, pages: 2–4. with her mother staging receptions for her, including at the British Residency in Cairo during their Egyptian stays in 1921 and 1922. It was during one of these receptions that she met her future husband, Brograve Beauchamp, the son of the Liberal MP Sir Edward Beauchamp, who continued to visit her when they both returned to England.
